description: This cache is dedicated to all OPEN, community driven projects,such as:OPEN source software / hardwareOPEN knowledgeOPEN street mapOPEN access publishingOPEN source music & filmand even OPEN source cola... and many more.This is a cache by ochtrup & die_kloetze, based on an idea of Die Diependeppen (used with permission).PS:[EN] We would be happy to see Open Logging caches at other major train stations. Feel free to contact us for templates and experience.[DE] √úber Open Logging Caches an weiteren gro√üen Bahnh√∂fen w√ºrden wir uns freuen.
